title: Changing runes while in aram champ select causes you to switch champions/reroll??
body:
Please let me know if something similar happened to you.
So, I played 2 rounds of aram because I wanted short games and I noticed that in the first game, while changing runes, I switched champions with someone. Apparently while changing runes, clicking still registers with stuff in champ select (I'm unsure if I was making the request or if someone requested and while changing runes, I accepted, trying to configure runes). I was annoyed, but thought that it was just a one time, dumb bug.
When I was in champ select the second time, it happened again, just that instead of switching champions, I somehow rerolled the champion I had when changing runes.
(I didn't investigate any further, so there's no clear proof. I was just mad and quit the game to post my thoughts.) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Happens to me regularly, i'm usually pretty pissed off when it happens
